name: 7.0.2.04. Level
content:

@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.VqmfepmRULVzQGwS]{7.0. Magic Basics}

    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.kJ9Y6R0EmdWvWAYS]{7.0.2.06. Casting Time}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.eoicSkLMiuBmRsJG]{7.0.2.07. Range}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.CObmMzf1HCwePOdv]{7.0.2.08. Aiming a Spell}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.IoLudXWL9DLU1p9l]{7.0.2.09. Duration}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.osoMkDti3clgURz9]{7.0.2.10. Saving Throw}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.iqCQcMGmm0pmWqUf]{7.0.2.11. Spell Resistance}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.PybdVd7VGR9riGuX]{7.0.2.12. Descriptive Text}

Source PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 212

The next line of a spell description gives the spell’s level, a number between 0 and 9 that defines the spell’s relative power. This number is preceded by a list of classes whose members can cast the spell. A spell’s level affects the DC for any save allowed against its effects.
